ComicInfo.Title: Chapter Eighteen: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
ComicInfo.Summary:
Since the very first page of THE DEPARTMENT OF TRUTH, questions have swirled around Lee Harvey Oswald, the director of the DoT—his motivations, his allegiances, and his true identity. Now, in our landmark 25th issue, prepare for answers that will change everything. Starting with…what really happened in Dallas?
JAMES TYNION IV (W0RLDTR33, Nice House on the Lake) and MARTIN SIMMONDS (UNIVERSAL MONSTERS: DRACULA) set their sights on a 25th-issue blowout for the multiple Eisner Award-nominated series!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-09-12 18:55:17. [CVDB1069458]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alison Sampson, David Romero, Elsa Charretier, John Pearson, Jordie Bellaire, Jorge Fornés, Martin Simmonds, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.Inker: Alison Sampson, David Romero, Elsa Charretier, John Pearson, Jordie Bellaire, Jorge Fornés, Martin Simmonds, Tyler Boss
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Martin Simmonds, Puppeteer Lee, W. Scott Forbes
